com.team23.weather.gui

Class LocationPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.team23.weather.gui.LocationPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocationObserver, IWeatherDataObserver, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class LocationPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ILocationObserver, IWeatherDataObserver
    A LocationPanel extends JPanel. A LocationPanel implements the IWeatherDataObserver interface, to listen for weather changes. A LocationPanel implements the ILocationObserver interface, to listen to location changes. A LocationPanel displays the current location for a weather forecast
    Author:
    Andrew Bloch-Hansen, Saquib Mian
    See Also:
    App, ScrollableGui, RefreshAction, ILocationObserver, IWeatherDataObserver, JPanel, Serialized Form
